select request_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO request(id, title, maker_id, consumer_id, type, content, hope_price, price, bound) VALUES (#{id},#{title},#{maker.id},#{consumer.id},#{category},#{content},#{hopePrice},#{price},#{bound})
mapper.sql: id, title, maker_id, consumer_id, type, content, hope_price, price, bound
SELECT id, title, maker_id, consumer_id, type, content, hope_price, price, bound, page
SELECT rownum rnum, id, title, maker_id, consumer_id, type, content, hope_price, price, bound
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum limitNum, A.* from request A where bound = #{bound} and rownum <= (#{page}*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE}) order by A.id desc ) , (select /*+INDEX_FES(table column) */ ceil(count(*)/${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE}) page from request where bound = #{bound}) where limitNum > ((#{page}-1)*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE})

FROM ( FROM request WHERE bound = #{bound} AND title LIKE '%${title}%') , (select /*+INDEX_FES(table column) */ ceil(count(*)/${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE}) page from request WHERE bound = #{bound} AND title LIKE '%${title}%') WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE} AND (#{page}*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE})

FROM ( FROM request WHERE bound = #{bound} AND content LIKE '%${content}%') , (select /*+INDEX_FES(table column) */ ceil(count(*)/${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE}) page from request WHERE bound = #{bound} AND content LIKE '%${content}%') WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE} AND (#{page}*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE})

FROM ( FROM request WHERE consumer_id = #{consumerId} ORDER BY id DESC) , (select /*+INDEX_FES(table column) */ ceil(count(*)/${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE}) page from request WHERE consumer_id = #{consumerId} ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{page}-1)*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE}) AND (#{page}*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE})

FROM ( FROM request WHERE consumer_id = #{consumerId} AND maker_id IS NOT NULL) , (select /*+INDEX_FES(table column) */ ceil(count(*)/${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE}) page from request WHERE consumer_id = #{consumerId} AND maker_id IS NOT NULL) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{page}-1)*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE}) AND (#{page}*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE})

(SELECT rownum rnum, r.id, r.title, r.maker_id, r.consumer_id, r.type, r.content, r.hope_price, r.price, r.bound, 1 page FROM request r INNER JOIN purchase_history ph ON r.id = ph.request_id WHERE r.consumer_id = #{consumerId} AND ph.payment = '${@ordermade.constants.Constants@PAYMENT_Y}')

FROM ( FROM request WHERE maker_id = #{makerId} ORDER BY id DESC) , (select /*+INDEX_FES(table column) */ ceil(count(*)/${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE}) page from request WHERE maker_id = #{makerId} ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{page}-1)*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE}) AND (#{page}*${@ordermade.constants.Constants@REQUEST_ROW_SIZE})

(SELECT rownum rnum, r.id, r.title, r.maker_id, r.consumer_id, r.type, r.content, r.hope_price, r.price, r.bound , 1 page FROM request r INNER JOIN purchase_history ph ON r.id = ph.request_id WHERE r.maker_id = #{makerId} AND ph.payment = '${@ordermade.constants.Constants@PAYMENT_Y}')
